title: Impact of Lack of Stimulus on U.S. Economy
itunes:title: Impact of Lack of Stimulus on U.S. Economy
description:
Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane discusses Wall Street traders taking home smaller slices in a banner year. Bloomberg Medical Science Reporter Michelle Cortez provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Reporter Ari Altstedter talk about an Indian-made motorcycle with a retro look that is coming after Harley. We get Businessweek Economics with Simona Mocuta, Senior Economist at State Street Global Advisors. He breaks down how a lack of stimulus could impact the U.S. economy. And we Drive to the Close with Walter Todd, President and CIO at Greenwood Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
